A4.text: Stewart achieved international stardom for starring as Bella Swan in The Twilight Saga film series (2008–2012).

A5.text: Stewart's film breakthrough came at age 12 for her role as the daughter of Jodie Foster's character in David Fincher's thriller Panic Room (2002).

A6.text: She concluded the role of Bella Swan in Breaking Dawn – Part 2, released in November 2012.

A7.text: She earned critical acclaim for her performances in Camp X-Ray (2014), Clouds of Sils Maria (2014), Personal Shopper (2016), and Seberg (2019).
